title: tvplus006

content: What happened: Ponzi scheme 8% PROFIT DAILYFlag type 1 (support/oppose): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3081 Thread Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5432917.0 Archived: https://archive.fo/ohA0PScammer Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3526970Website: https://www.orexbit.com/Archived: https://archive.fo/wip/fDzQVQuote   Domain Name: OREXBIT.COM   Registry Domain ID: 2746734333_DOMAIN_COM-VRSN   Registrar WHOIS Server: whois.namesilo.com   Registrar URL: http://www.namesilo.com   Updated Date: 2022-12-27T18:43:02Z   Creation Date: 2022-12-23T20:41:53Z

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: tvplus006 on January 11, 2023, 11:40:17 AMWhat happened: Ponzi scheme 8% PROFIT DAILYFlag type 1 (support/oppose): https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3081 I'll support flags that are created for the Ponzi schemes I have bad memories of these Ponzi schemes when I was just starting to invest, we all thought it was real by how they constructed their words to entice you to invest, on this one they even post a certification of incorporation which I'm sure is fake.They claimed to beQuote a global leader in the cryptocurrency business, OrexBit has assembled a team of genuine experts. We concentrate on trading on forex, stocks, bonds, oil, gold & cryptocurrency exchanges. This is an old introduction to all the Ponzi schemes they used in it when Cryptocurrency is not yet popular and they used dollar trading any platform that offer 5% higher is a Ponzi schema and can be considered high-risk investment and potential scam.
